nodes.text: A racer belonged to Jarek Yeager. He had used it to compete in races on the Colossus platform, but by 34 ABY Yeager no longer did so, keeping the ship in his private hangar in his repair shop. Jarek continued to refuse to fly the racer, until the Platform Classic. Jarek again flew his racer in this race against his brother, Marcus Speedstar.

Yeager would later fly this craft alongside Ace Squadron in defense of the Colossus during it's escape from First Order forces on Castilon. During the battle Yeager would down several TIE fighters, allowing the Colossus to escape.
In 35 ABY, the racer was part of a fleet assembled by Lando Calrissian to assist the Resistance during the battle against the Sith Eternal forces over the planet Exegol.
Originally designed for Star Wars Resistance, Jarek Yeager's racer was among the ships modeled by ILM and included in the final battle of Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
